messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/31/2005 1:47:34 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... NO Kidding!! I would never have thought to look for the source-I thought that was a David
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/31/2005 1:47:34 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
dezigna@... writes:

> You remind me of a man.
> What man?
> The man with the power.
> What power?
> The power of hoodoo.
> Hoodoo?
> You do.
> Do what?
> Remind me of the man.
> What man?.........
>
> Cary Grant and Myrna Loy, "The Bachelor and the Bobby Soxer" (1947)
>

NO Kidding!! I would never have thought to look for the source-I thought that
was a David Bowie/Labyrinth original!! Wow... Thanks for the education!

Peace,
Sang


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
